content: the cow squish is a cuddly moo-velous and very squishy crochet pattern create an adorable cow amigurumi with this easy crochet pattern perfect for beginners this pattern includes written instructions and a video tutorial for all the add-ons grab this pattern by the horns and make your own - it s udderly fun **unique features-** easy crochet pattern suitable for all skill levels includes written instructions and video tutorial for guidance **materials needed-** 8 0 mm hook **susan bates** https //amzn to/3fxslgw 350 yds **bernat blanket** https //amzn to/4mlyphz 6 - super bulky 100% polyester 300g/10 5 oz 201 m/220 yds **10 microbead pillow ball** https //amzn to/3fbcmaq or **fairfield poly-fil** https //amzn to/3hvrhlu **2 safety eyes - 24mm** https //amzn to/3qjgplf **2 safety eyes - 14mm** https //amzn to/3qjgplf **stitch markers** https //www yarnspirations com/susan-bates-crystalites-stitchpins/14129m html &utm_source=influencer_moogly&utm_medium=blog&utm_campaign=2021_3_pattern
